Kchuib Fohc`fd Ufhtd-Ncrrird, Ucdbc ^ufz-Gëcz
Fhtrdgu``fðh
Pioýh bc Drochfzc`fðh Kuhgfcb gi bc Pcbug (DKP), bc kigf`fhc trcgf`fdhcb (KW) y bc kigf`fhc cbtirhctfvc y `dkpbikihtcrfc (KC@) si gilfhih `dkd ib
‒
orupd gi prã`tf`cs schftcrfcs qui hd ldrkch pcrti gi bc trcgf`fðh gi uh pcës d hd istãh fhtiorcgcs ih su sfsti-kc schftcrfd privcbi`fihti
‛
. Ib tærkfhd gi kigf`fhc `dkpbikih-tcrfc, c su viz, si rilfiri c bcs tircpfcs d bds trctckfihtds qui sdh uscgcs gi kchirc supbikihtcrfc c bc kigf`fhc cbdpãtf`c (3). Bc kigf`fhc cbtirhctfvc si utfbfzc ih buocr gi bc kigf`fhc cbdpãtf`c y si ihtfihgi `dkd cquibbcs tæ`hf`cs, prã`tf`cs, prd`igfkfihtds, ihldquis d `dhd`fkfihtds qui utfbfzch bc istfkubc`fðh gib luh`fd-hckfihtd gi bcs biyis hcturcbis pcrc bc cutdrrioubc`fðh gib sir aukchd `dh ib dnmitd gi prdkdvir, privihfr, trctcr y riacnfbftcr bc scbug gi bc pdnbc`fðh gisgi uh pihsckfihtd adbëstf`d. Pi `dh-sfgirch `dkd kigf`fhcs cbtirhctfvcs bc kigf`fhc adkidpãtf`c, bc trcgf`fdhcb @afhc y bc kigf`fhc Cyurvigc. Gihtrd gi bcs tirc-pfcs cbtirhctfvcs si siócbch, ihtri dtrcs, bc airndbdoëc, tircpfcs kchucbis, imir`f`fds tircpæutf`ds, ihldqui sdnri kihti-`uirpd, tircpfcs nfdbðof`cs, tircpfcs c pcrtfr gi bc ihiroëc `dkd `dh`iptd oihærf`d, puistd qui si acnbc, pdr imikpbd, gi qui si puigi fh-tirpritcr y istugfcr c bds siris aukchds `dkd uhc drochfzc`fðh gi
‒
ihiroëcs nfdbðof`cs
‛
(nfdihiroëcs) sioýh bc nfdihiroætf`c, gi bc ihiroëc vftcb sioýh bc adkidpctëc, gi rioubc`fðh gi bc `drrfih-ti ihiroætf`c gihtrd gi uh sfstikc gi `fr`ubc`fðh ih ib `uirpd (bds kirfgfchds) sioýh bc c`upuhturc, ihtri dtrcs (>). Ih ib `csd `dbdknfchd, bc KW `dkprihgi bd qui si ac gihdkfhcgd kigf`f-hc trcgf`fdhcb fhgëoihc `dbdknfchc (3, >). Ucrc ib tikc pbchticgd ih istc rivfsfðh hd si tfihi ih `uihtc bc kigf`fhc trcgf`fdhcb, y sdbckihti si `dhsfgirch bcs kigf`fhcs cbtirhctfvcs y `dkpbi-kihtcrfcs. Ih @dbdknfc, bc Biy 33<7->55? gi Wcbihtd Aukchd tfihi pdr dnmitd istcnbi`ir bcs gfspdsf`fdhis ribc`fdhcgcs `dh bds prd`isds gi pbchic`fðh, ldrkc`fðh, vfofbch`fc y `dhtrdb gib imir`f`fd, ib gisikpiód y bc ætf`c gib tcbihtd aukchd gib ãric gi bc scbug, kigfchti bc crtf`ubc`fðh gi bds gflirihtis c`tdris qui fhtirvfihih ih istds prd`isds. Istcnbi`i gflirih`fcs ihtri kigf-`fhcs y tircpfcs, csë=
‒
si `dhsfgirch kigf`fhcs cbtirhctfvcs, ihtri dtrcs, bc kigf`fhc trcgf`fdhcb `afhc, kigf`fhc cyurvigc, kigf`fhc hcturdpãtf`c y bc kigf`fhc adkidpãtf`c: gihtrd gi bcs tircpfcs cbtirhctfvcs y `dkpbikihtcrfcs si `dhsfgirch, ihtri dtrcs, bc air-ndbdoëc, c`upuhturc, kdxfnustfðh, tircpfcs kchucbis y imir`f`fds tircpæutf`ds
‛
(0). Gi c`uirgd `dh bcs gilfhf`fdhis `dhsfohcgcs, bc ldrkc`fðh ih bcs
kigf`fhcs cbtirhctfvcs
tcbis `dkd bc adkidpctëc y bc kigf`fhc trcgf`fdhcb `afhc, gilfhfgcs `dkd sfstikcs kægf`ds `dkpbimds, si `dhsfgirc qui ginih sir ix`busfvckihti pcrc kæ-gf`ds `dh tëtubd dntihfgd ih uhfvirsfgcg ri`dhd`fgc. Bcs tircpfcs cbtirhctfvcs, pdr ib `dhtrcrfd, puigih sir imir`fgcs pdr dtrds prd-lisfdhcbis gi bc scbug.
Kætdgd
Ib prdpðsftd gi isti trcncmd lui ricbfzcr uhc ivcbuc`fðh gi cr-të`ubds sfoufihgd bds prfh`fpfds gi bc fhvistfoc`fðh gis`rfptfvc. Bds crtë`ubds rivfscgds luirdh fgihtflf`cgds c trcvæs gi bcs ncsis gi gctds P`fibd, Nfriki, Kigbfhi y Uunkig, y si fh`buyirdh cquibbds qui aunfirch sfgd punbf`cgds gisgi ib >559 acstc ib >533, gisc-rrdbbcgds ih @dbdknfc, Croihtfhc, Nrcsfb y Kæxf`d. Bds `rftirfds pcrc bc sibi``fðh gi bds crtë`ubds luirdh= 3) su ribc`fðh gfri`tc `dh ib chãbfsfs gi bds ili`tds gi bcs KC@: >) bds cvch`is qui si gikuistrch ih @dbdknfc y dtrds pcësis bctfhdckirf`chds `dkd Croihtfhc, Nrcsfb, Kæxf`d y @afbi `dh bc utfbfzc`fðh gi bc KC@ ih bc pristc`fðh gi bds sirvf`fds gi scbug: 0) crtë`ubds qui prisihtcrch ib chãbfsfs gi dlirtc y gikchgc ih isti tfpd gi kigf`fhc: 7) is-tugfds gi risubtcgds gi ih`uistcs gi `cbfgcg gi vfgc y `cbfgcg gi sirvf`fds gi scbug ih @dbdknfc. Ucrc `ukpbfr `dh ib prdpðsftd gib crtë`ubd si rivfsð ib pctrðh gi usd ih ib kuhgd, pcrtf`ubcrkihti ih cbouhds pcësis bctfhdckirf`chds ‗Croihtfhc, Nrcsfb, Kæxf-`d‗, ib kcr`d biocb pcrc su prã`tf`c ih @dbdknfc, bcs vihtcmcs qui si dntfihih `dh su usd gihtrd gi bc pristc`fðh gi sirvf`fds gi scbug y, lfhcbkihti, si prisihtc uh kdgibd fhtiorcb gi cpbf`c`fðh gihtrd gib sfstikc gi scbug.
Chãbfsfs i fhtirpritc`fðh gi bc fhldrkc`fðh
Pi fgihtflf`crdh 06 crtë`ubds qui ixpbdrcnch bc fhtiorc`fðh gi bcs KC@ ih cspi`tds `dkd lri`uih`fc gi usd, prilirih`fcs y tfpds gi `dhsubtc. Bc lri`uih`fc gi usd gi bcs KC@ is uh fhgf`cgdr gi quæ tchtd `dkfihzc c fhtiorcrsi istc kigf`fhc `dh bds sirvf`fds gi scbug ih uh pcës. Ih 3665, cbrigigdr gib 07
%
gi bc pdnbc`fðh ih Istcgds Yhfgds utfbfzcnc bds sirvf`fds gi kigf`fhc cbtirhctfvc, y pcrc 366? cukihtð cb 7?
%
(7, 9). Bds istugfds kuistrch qui `cgc cód bc pdnbc`fðh ocstc kãs gi 30 kfbbdhis gi gðbcris ih sirvf`fds y trctckfihtds gi bcs KC@, bd `ucb is rilbimd gi bc fkpdrtch`fc qui ach tdkcgd istds sirvf`fds ih bc sd`figcg istcgduhfgihsi (<). Ixfsti pd`c fhldrkc`fðh sdnri bc privcbih`fc gib usd gi bcs KC@ ih pcësis bctfhdckirf`chds: ih @afbi y @dbdknfc ib ?5 y 75
%
gi bc pdnbc`fðh rispi`tfvckihti sdh usucrfds gi cboýh tfpd gi kigf`fhc trcgf`fdhcb d cbtirhctfvc (?). Ih @chcgã ib ?5

gi bc pdnbc`fðh ac utfbfzcgd uhc gi istcs kigf`fhcs cb kihds uhc viz:
